string.name: declaration_main_content2
string.Data: "If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Mi Music."
